languages.text: {n}Вода обжигает, но лишь на мгновение. Ее жар уносит прочь из тела усталость, а из головы — тревоги и мысли о завтра. Вы ощущаете прикосновение под водой. Джай, соблазнительно улыбаясь, накручивает прядь волос на палец.{/n} "Разве не божественно? И почему мы не делали этого раньше?"

{n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вода обжигает, но лишь на мгновение. Ее жар уносит прочь из тела усталость, а из головы — тревоги и мысли о завтра. Вы ощущаете прикосновение под водой. Джай, соблазнительно улыбаясь, накручивает прядь волос на палец.{/n} "Разве не божественно? И почему мы не делали этого раньше?"

languages.text: {n}水很烫人，但你很快就适应了。暖意驱散了你身上的疲惫，也赶走了你脑中昨日的思绪与忧虑。你感觉到了来自水下的触感。婕伊露出了迷人的笑容，用手指捻起一绺头发。{/n}“这真是太棒了，是吧？咱们怎么没早点这么做呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}水很烫人，但你很快就适应了。暖意驱散了你身上的疲惫，也赶走了你脑中昨日的思绪与忧虑。你感觉到了来自水下的触感。婕伊露出了迷人的笑容，用手指捻起一绺头发。{/n}“这真是太棒了，是吧？咱们怎么没早点这么做呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}お湯は火傷しそうなほどに熱かったが、それも最初だけだった。熱が身体から疲れを追い出し、頭から過去の悩みを消し去っていく。湯船の中で、あなたに触れるものを感じた。ジェイは蠱惑的にほほえみ、髪を指に絡ませる。{/n}「神秘的でしょ？どうしてもっと早くこうしなかったのかしら」
languages.original_text: {n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}お湯は火傷しそうなほどに熱かったが、それも最初だけだった。熱が身体から疲れを追い出し、頭から過去の悩みを消し去っていく。湯船の中で、あなたに触れるものを感じた。ジェイは蠱惑的にほほえみ、髪を指に絡ませる。{/n}「神秘的でしょ？どうしてもっと早くこうしなかったのかしら」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}El agua es abrasadora, peros solo al principio. El calor expulsa el cansancio de tu cuerpo y las preocupaciones y el ayer de tu mente. Sientes que algo te toca bajo el agua. Jae sonríe, tentadora, y retuerce un mechón de pelo en torno a su dedo.{/n} «Una sensación divina, ¿verdad? ¿Por qué no hemos hecho esto antes?».
languages.original_text: {n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El agua es abrasadora, peros solo al principio. El calor expulsa el cansancio de tu cuerpo y las preocupaciones y el ayer de tu mente. Sientes que algo te toca bajo el agua. Jae sonríe, tentadora, y retuerce un mechón de pelo en torno a su dedo.{/n} «Una sensación divina, ¿verdad? ¿Por qué no hemos hecho esto antes?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'eau est bouillante, mais vous vous y habituez vite. La chaleur dissipe la fatigue de votre corps et chasse de votre tête les inquiétudes et les pensées de la veille. Vous sentez une main qui vous touche dans l'eau. Jae joue avec une mèche de ses cheveux, un sourire séducteur aux lèvres.{/n} « N'est-ce pas divin ? Pourquoi avons-nous attendu aussi longtemps ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'eau est bouillante, mais vous vous y habituez vite. La chaleur dissipe la fatigue de votre corps et chasse de votre tête les inquiétudes et les pensées de la veille. Vous sentez une main qui vous touche dans l'eau. Jae joue avec une mèche de ses cheveux, un sourire séducteur aux lèvres.{/n} « N'est-ce pas divin ? Pourquoi avons-nous attendu aussi longtemps ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Wasser fühlt sich kochend heiß an, aber nur anfänglich. Die Hitze sorgt dafür, dass deine körperliche Erschöpfung nachlässt und Kummer und Sorgen verschwinden. Unter Wasser spürst du eine Berührung. Jae lächelt verlockend und dreht eine Haarlocke um ihren Finger.{/n} "Ist das nicht göttlich? Warum haben wir das nicht schon früher gemacht?"
languages.original_text: {n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

Unter Wasser spürst du eine Berührung. Jae lächelt verlockend und dreht eine Haarlocke um ihren Finger.{/n} "Ist das nicht göttlich? Warum haben wir das nicht schon früher gemacht?"

You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

languages.text: {n}Suyun sıcaklığı başta yakıcı geliyor. Sıcaklık, bedenindeki yorgunluğu ve kafanda dönüp duran dünün endişelerini ve düşüncelerini alıp götürüyor. Suyun altında bir şeyin sana dokunduğunu hissediyorsun. Jae, davetkârca gülümseyip saçının bir buklesini parmakları arasında döndürüyor.{/n} "Muhteşem bir his, değil mi? Neden daha önce yapmadık ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}The water is scalding, but only at first. The heat drives the weariness from your body and the worries and thoughts of yesterday from your head. You feel a touch under the water. Jae, smiling alluringly, twists a lock of hair around her finger.{/n} "Isn't it divine? Why didn't we do this sooner?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su yakıcı sıcaklıkta ama sadece ilk başta. Sıcaklık, bedenindeki yorgunluğu ve kafanda dönüp duran dünün endişelerini ve düşüncelerini alıp götürüyor. Suyun altında bir şeyin sana dokunduğunu hissediyorsun. Jae davetkâr bir şekilde gülümsüyor ve saçının bir buklesini parmaklarının arasında döndürüyor.{/n} "Muhteşem bir his, değil mi? Neden daha önce yapmadık ki?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
